values:
<font size= 20>I GOT A MUH FUCKIN' JOB!!!!
</font>

Be ready Little People's Landing. I'm coming. And I'm stealing all your money!!!




And of course the only person to kill this excellent mood... Dun Dun Dun
MY MOTHER!

Grounded.
Again.
I can't wait until my mom isn't crazy.

From now on, I have my own back.
I'm looking out for myself, even if I'm the only one.
I'm getting a job.
And I'm going to make a ton of money.
I'll be working all the time.
But I'll be paying my own way.
Everything I do I'm going to push it to the limit.
Because there's nothing left.

<b>Depend on no one else to get you what you want.

2006 "Resolutions". If you will. Not really resolutions. More like goals. Things I'd like to accomplish this year. Things I know won't really happen, but perhaps would like to keep in mind. Just for kicks. And attempts. And hopefully, some sort of result. 1. Be Healthier Eating healthier, excercising (I'd like to tone up, not really loose weight). Just in general, to live a healthy lifestyle. 2. Trust More It's really difficult for me to let my guard down, and be completely comfortable around someone. But I figure, if I don't trust more people, I'll never really be living life, because I won't know what else to expect. How can I truly know people, if I'm not myself around them? 3. Get back into guitar Self explanitory. 4. Drive Less I'm getting sick of driving. I'd like to carpool. It's better for the enviornment anyways. This leads to my next resolution... 5. Have a relationship I haven't had one in so long. I don't want to have one, just to be in a relationship, I'd like to like the person. But if I get into a relationship, the boy can drive. I think I'd be a pretty good girlfriend too... 6. Overanalyize less I will never be able to tell what someone is really thinking. I'll end up driving myself crazy. 7. Get better grades I'm not doing poorly now, but I know I could have done better. School is my job, so I'm going to give it my all. 8. Narrow down college choices I'm going to have to do this soon. Before 2007. Becuase that's when I graduate. Eeeek. 9. Spend more time with family 10. Be more forgiving and understanding I'm going to try really hard to see things from other's perspectives. Because I CARE. (..?) 11. Listen to every song on my iPod Be ready, Barracuda. 12. Have a party 13. Become a Big Sister (the volunteer) I have so much free time. I really want to give back to the community. 14. Get a dang job. It's about time I broke into the real world. I have a job set up.. probably. Salon Foushee. I think I'd like it... 15. Save money I spent so much in 2005, it's ridonkulous. 16.Enjoy 2006 No longer will I being participating in things I don't want to do. If I'm not interested, I'm not going to do it. Plain and simple. I'm sorry if you read this all. Now I must go back to wearing my new snowboard boots around the house with my sweats on.

My knight in shining armor,

he turned out to be a loser in tin foil.

January 1. did you have a new year's resolution this year? mm probably, but i don't remember 2.Who kissed you at midnight? I did not. 3. does it snow where you live? yep 4. do you like hot chocolate? oh yeah 5. have you ever been to times square to watch the ball drop? ha nope, but i've watched it on TV. it would be pretty sweet though February 1. who was your valentine in 2005? KAYLA! 2. what did your valentine get you? A card, a rose.. 3. when you were little, did you buy valentines for your whole class? sure did! March 1. are you Irish? 25% biotch! 2. Do you wear green on St. Patty's Day? duh 3.what did you do for St. Patty's Day in 2005? um.. went TPing, door knockering, and drove around in Aleks' car. April 1. Do you like the rain? a lot 2. Did you play an April fool's joke on anyone this year? haha oh tons, mostly on adam though 3. do you get tons of candy on easter? that's the glory of having two houses to go for on holidays May 1. What's your favorite kind of flower? I'm thinkin' tulips. (no number two?) NO! 3. Do you like the spring? I believe in equality among the seasons. 4. Finish the phrase: April showers bring may flowers, what do may flowers bring? .. Pilgrims? 5. What would you think of as a spring color? green/yellow/purple/pastels? June 1. What year did you graduate from school? ... I didn't. Still waitin' for that big '07. 2. Did you go on any vacations last June? nope July 1. What did you do on the 4th of July? lit off fireworks with Kayla, Paul, Kian, and Chris 3. do you go on any vacations during this month? yeah to SEATTLE! wooo! August 1. did you do anything special to end off your summer? ha not really. umm.. pulled a few all nighters with friends? 2. what was your favorite summer memory of '05? oh goodness... all the funny ones? 3. do you go swimming a lot in the summer? i only went at night... haha 4. do you go to the beach a lot? ha i hit up all the beaches in colorado September 1. Did you attend school/college in '05? poo, yes. 2. who is/was your favorite teacher? Mr. Welsch was cool. And still in '05, but sophomore year, I liked Mr. Cane and Carlson a lot. 3. do you like fall better than summer? equality. October 1. what was your favorite halloween costume ever? when i could fit inside a pillowcase that had eyeholes cut out of it. 2. what's your favorite candy? reeses and 3 musketeers. Oh yeah, and milky ways. 3. what did you dress up like this year? a gangster. straight up dogg. November 1. whose house do you usually go to for thanksgiving? my mom's 2. Do you like stuffing? i've never really tried it, but since it's made out of turkey insides, i don't really want to 3. what are you thankful for? "Elves, Santa, Mom, Dad, Dog, House" (from Pre-K!) December 1. do you celebrate christmas? Chrismahanukwanza. 2. have you ever been kissed under mistletoe? not yet! 3. what do you want this year for christmas? chapstick, a snowboard, and earphones for my ipod. 4. what's the best present you ever got for Christmas? guh.. barbie's dream house? 5. do you like cold weather? yeah, but not unbearably cold. 6. How would u rate your 05? best year so far. probably. The Kool-Aid man would come in like "OH YEAH, OH YEAH!" If that was me, I would just say "Oh no, you fix this wall before my dad comes home! He's not going to believe a talking bowl of fruit punch ruined our nice house!"

I am fighting with Subin and Nate. Because they called me stupid. And then to add insult to injury, Nate told me I smelled bad. This behavior is to be expected from lame-head Nate, but Subin?? Oh, that Korean is going down.

Today Nate walked into English singing "My hot dog has a first name, it's O-S-C-A-R.."
So I said, "it's bologna, IDIOT!"

And now everyone's pissed off. Haha.

And when I had a cupcake, Nate took it, and stuck is finger in the frosting. SICK! 
Sean: "You know she just licked that whole thing right?"
Nate: "Oh well, it's just Kaylee, she just has herpes"
Kaylee: ".. Says the walking STD!"



<big><big><big>OWNED.

"There's something incredibly beautiful about a guy doing whatever it takes and making himself as vulernable and foolish as he has to be to win the love of somebody he adores" True that VH1's I ♥ the 80's! Oh goodness, how I wish he tried. Just gave me something to work with. Come on now, show it! I do want someone who shows what they feel. Or says it. That can't eat, can't sleep, reach for the stars, over the fence, world series kind of thing. Fuckin' asshole Jeff. It sounds terrible and bitchy, but I want him to be miserable. Plus, that's who I am. A big old bitch. Fine, I miss him, yes. Why, I do not know. But I want him to miss me. I want him to want me. I want him to regret hurting me, and letting me go. I want to get inside his head, and drive him crazy. But how I do love having new crushes. Hot? Yes! Funny? Yes. Flirting back? Yes. Out of my league? YES. :-/ Oooh boy, I know it's not gonna happen, but daaaayumn! Plus, I'm now friends with some of his friends, so I guess there's a chance of possible hanging outage. I entered in the Ping Pong tournament today! "Kaylee Pitt" Haha, me and Aleks are gonna switch off like, every 5 points or something. I have a tummy ache. And I miss you. I haven't seen anyone on LJ for the longest time. Poo. Yeah, right, and Santa Claus lives with the Tooth Fairy in Queens!
Sometimes you're the windshield. Other times, you're the bug.

Having this much gas SUCKS. Having nothing to do on a Saturday night, because of your lack of gas SUCKS. Getting a job so you can afford gas SUCKS. School would have actually been better than this weekend. I'm so sorry Kayla. I miss you so freakin' much.. but.. what did you place?

Track 1. Incubus- Nice to Know You "Nice to know you, goodbye" Track 2. Kelly Clarkson- Since You've Been Gone "You had your chance, you blew it. Out of sight, out of mind." Track 3. Avril Lavigne- My Happy Ending "It's nice to know that you were there, thanks for acting like you cared, and making me feel like I was the only one. It's nice to know we had it all, thanks for watching as I fall, and letting me know we were done." Track 4.The Used- Buried Myself Alive "And if you want me back, you're gonna have to ask nicer than that" Track 5.Saves The Day- Anywhere With You "So here's to the passing of all that could be between you and me" Track 6.*//\\//sync- Bye Bye Bye "I just wanna tell you that I've had enough. You may hate me but it ain't no lie, baby, bye bye bye. Track 7. Ben Folds- Song For The Dumped "So you wanted to take a break, slow it down, and have some space.." Track 8. Amber Pacific= Thoughts before you "So why should you take my hand, when you can't promise happy endings?" Track 9. Fall Out Boy- A Little Less Sixteen Candles, A Little More Touch Me "She said, she said, she said, 'Why don't you just drop dead?'" Track 10. Motion City Soundtrack- When 'You're' Around "The least you could do, is take it back, all the vicious remarks, and verbal attacks, cause I can't fucking stand it, when YOU'RE around" Track 11. Homegrown- Kiss Me, Diss Me "Now you say you miss me, but you used me, confused me, but you don't wanna lose me, don't talk to me, don't acknowledge me anymore." Track 12. Sum 41- Pieces "I'm better off on my own." Track 13. Mest- It's Over "She looked at you and said to your face 'It's Over, it's over'" Track 14.Matchbook Romance- Playing For Keeps "You're as welcome as cancer" Track 15. Brand New- Okay, I believe you, but my tommy gun don't "We're concentrating on falling apart" Track 16.John Mayer- Split Screen Sadness "Now we're tired, battered fighters" "I still wish you'd fought me till your dying day, don't let me get away" Track 17. Michelle Branch- Are you Happy Now? "I am giving up this game, and leaving you with all the blame cause I don't care" Track 18. Britney Spears- Stronger "I've had enough, I'm not your property as from today." ENJOY.

If you love something, let it go.


If it comes back, it's your's,
and that's how you know.



<b><center>Happiness is simple

It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew, and you can walk down the halls, walking past people like they never meant anything to you, like they were never in your life at all.

I know I'm not supposed to talk to most of you, and that's fine. I'm sure she's worth it. 

Christopher Leos, I'm very sorry I didn't call you back last night. Very sorry indeed. Last night just sucked balls, and I got in trouble for driving 3 people around, cause I'm only legally allowed to have 1. Uggggh. Next weekend, or bowling/bingo for SURE.

Jeff thinks he's got mono. He thinks that I gave it to him too, even though I've never ever in my life had mono. My mom asked what his sympotoms were, and I said, "Faggot."

Turns out, Tyler Holtzinger, is an asshole. He's trading his car in so he can get A FUCKING 2006 MUSTANG. wtf? Why on earth would they care so much about the 50 dollars they will be counted off for trading in his 1993 Spirit, if they can afford a goddamn MUSTANG. Fuckface.

Oh, Mickey, you're so fine, you're so fine you blow my mind! Hey Mickey!

I hope everyone had an excellent time at Sadies last night! Who wore Khaki pants?!

<b>You coming back to me is against all odds, and that's what I've gotta face.

Today sucked major ass.

Fritz moved out. He's living with his french teacher until Friday. After that, he's either moving in the the mormon family that he didn't like, or Aric Holmes. Apparently, he still wants to hang out with me all the time, but there's no way I'm going to pick him up all the time. Especially if he's at Aric's house. That would just be weird.

Physics is really hard shit. Oh man. I don't know why I don't understand a lot of this stuff, but man, it's kicking my ass. I really should be trying to do my homework for that now.

Tyson has an ear infection. He's had it for about 3 weeks, and we've been putting medication in, but it's not going away. Because he's half charpei, his ear canals are twisted and they might have to do surgery. Poor puppy!

So last week, I backed into Tyler Holtzinger. He drives a crappy 93 Spirit. I think it's a big piece of crap. I told him I'd pay for it though, and to just let me know how much it would cost to fix it. I guess they're trying to get me for as much as they can so he can trade his car in and get a nicer one. They want to repaint the whole car and everything. I didn't even chip his paint, I just dented the door a little bit, and honestly the car is so junky, it's not even worth fixing. But I think it's really shitty that they're doing that. I don't think it's right at all, and its complete bullshit that they're trying to get me for as much as they can. When they're TRADING THE CAR IN. When you trade a car in, of course they aren't going to give you a very high price. It's not a big deal. Asshole, I wish people got what they deserved.

Concert tomorrow WOOOOOOO. As Mickey said, "maybe if you get lucky, you'll see me"!!!!!!!!!!!

<b>Today didn't have to be this way
Tomorrow is another day
Another chance to make things right

R.I.P. PONCHO November 2004-October 31, 2005 You were a good fish.
I like Physics now. Oh, how having a hot lab partner makes everything so much better. If I understood stuff, it would be better too, but now I'm too busy talking! Today was a lazy day! Sub in Physics, so I did nothing. 2nd, I bought a frog. 3rd, I got out of 10 mins early to deliver the frog, but I got to read MACBETH! YESS!!! 4th, I got there 10 mins late and did nothing. Ditched 5th. 6th we played a game.. How sweet ass. So.. who all got prank called? Fuckin' Napoleon! Oh, and seriously, am I a bitch? I know I can be really bitchy sometimes, but overall would "bitch" be a word to describe THE KAYLEE? I'm gonna go work out! Whooooo!!!!! Viva La MASTER BETA Viva La Stanley! Love will remain a mystery But give me your hand and you will see Your heart is keeping time with me

Okeeeeeey dokey.

Fritz. Is moving out. (Period?) Yeah, he doesn't think that he got a very good fit for a family and is moving out. That blows, cause I actually was starting to like him. All that stuff about him being kind of tolerable and was almost growing on me.. was me just trying to be tough incase he turned out like Adam in the end and pissed me off. But he's leaving. Gah. I'm actually kind of hurt. I feel like I'm just not good enough. He keeps telling me that it's not my fault, and that he'll have a really really hard time finding a host sister as cool as me, but I just can't help thinking that I did something wrong. Or I could have done something better. Maybe if I just got him to school on time.. 

Hmm so went to play Bingo last night, and it was a lot of fun! Woooo!

I'm losing my voice, and I sound like a queer.

I kind of want to go to Sadies now. But.. I.. uh.. gkldhgsd/,nvbGAH

There's this song that I like, but I don't know how it goes, and I try to think about that every freakin' day. But I just can't figure it out. I can't remember it right, and I dunno, but I really want to find it!

What is everyone being for Halloween? Oh, I just can't decide!

hhhhhoook so this is the earth um.. ya.. just kiddin but it's been a while so how's about an update? sure. i only have 6 minutes though so.. well ya school is kicking my ass. i need to get it into gear. i still have a 3.4 but it's sad that that would bring my 3.9 GPA down. i can't have that slip. i sound pathetic, but that's really all i have to get into college. which i have been thinking about nonstop cause omygosh it decides the rest of your life and holy crap i'm just not ready for that yet. but where is everyone thinking about going? i want to go to san francisco or northern california i think. i just don't know if i could be away from home/friends. or.. shit i hate this mr branch was on the price is right today. for as much as i have started to hate that man (seeing as he has become the teacher in my lowest grade i've ever gotten ever), it was actually pretty cool. it made him slightly tolerable. i'm loving this weather. oh man oh man i love it when it's cold. maybe cause my last name is winters, or maybe because i'm tired of the heat (i hate hot), or maybe i just want something different but man, today was nice. i love love love love love being cold. just the feeling of long sleeves shirts put me in heaven fritz is now tolerable. i'm starting to like him even. it's hard that i'm constantly comparing him to adam, but i'm sure that will pass. perhaps it's because i saw him for about 10 minutes total all weekend? maybe. My gosh, I miss people. Lately it's been jeff jeff jeff and shiiiyit son, i'm sick of it. it's weird how i can hang out with people constantly that i don't even like being around. i told him friday that the last place i wanted to go was john's. so we went to john's. he said for only 20 minutes, and we were there all night. i ended up spending the whole night listing ways to kill myself the top ways -sticking my keys into the electrical socket -plunging to my death off john's balcony -leaping down the stairs in the fetal positioin -announcing that i was allergic to peanuts, then making a PB&J I need a haircut. I'm addicted to cracking my knuckles now. Oh, the shame, for I will never be a hand model because my knuckles will be FAT. I am aware, I've been misled I disconnect my heart, my head Don't wanna recognize when things go bad The things that you'll accept Except that I am finding the words to say

Well, I've got everything figured out. I got mad at Adam at the end of the year last year because he was leaving. Now, I don't like Fritz, not because of any particular reason other than he is not Adam. I push people away because I'm afraid of relationships. Mick liked me and yes, I liked Mick, but I couldn't admit to it until Mick moved on to Caitlin. Now there's nothing left for me to do. I must find it amusing to watch myself scramble to save things or help things at the last minute. I think I do this because then it seems like I'm trying to have a relationship, but I'm the reason things fall apart in the first place. Ugh, I've just done it so many times. I quit volleyball because I'm lazy. I tried to make excuses, but there are none to make except for the fact that I fuck things up. Regularly. Homecoming was a lot of fun though! (this is gonna be long, sorry) Aleks and Thomas Me and Jeff (look at how well we match!) Mick and Caitlin Aleks, Thomas, Mick, Caitlin, Tawna, Kian, Jeff, Me da girls Tawna, Kian "Hey, everybody, look like you're having fun!" You can't save me, you can't change me, well I'm waiting for my wake-up call, and everything, everything's my fault

I'm a very broke girl. It's ridiculous. It's because of homecoming though, and it's supposed to be a good night, so why not spend some money, eh? I'm so excited for it. Woooo boy. Jeff's just getting mad because I won't pick a resteraunt. But he asked me, he should pick it. So, this is my dress Please ignore the black bra straps, gay look on my face, and the mass amount of cleavage. Thank you. Shake it like jello make the boys say hello Oh man. Somehow Jeff found out I was hanging out with Mick the other day. Mick had to tell him because he asked how cuddling with Mick was. It's not like I was trying to hide it from him, but at the same time, I was. I'm starting to meet more people, and it's sweet! I got whistled at in the parking lot the other day too, and I got really embarassed, but I think its funny now. Uh oh. Butterflies. Goodnight. P.S. My favorite quote of the day- Nick: It smells like kool-aid in here! Kaylee: Oh yeah? Nick: Yeah! I had kool-aid this morning! Kaylee: Ooo was it strawberry starfruit?! That's the best! Nick: Yeah right strawberry starfruit. Who mixes two flavors? My favorite kind is LEMON LIME!

K.. I'm bored as fucking hell. Daaayum.

Homecoming is turning out to be a nightmare. Honestly, I better have the time of my life, or I'll be pissed. I've been dress shopping 4 times, and I can't find a single one thats even remotely close to what I wanted. Jeff keeps threatening to not go with me, and even though he's kidding, that's so gay. It just... what a homo. 

School is hard. Student teachers suck ass. I think it's so dumb that my grade has to suffer because my math teacher doesn't know how to teach. She can explain things pretty well, but she doesn't explain why they work. If I have the exact same problem that she did, I'll understand, but if it's a little bit different, I'll get lost. I'm getting frusterated because usually I'm acing math with like a bajillion percent. Physics is some hard shit too. Oooo boy.

I have the worst taste ever in my mouth right now. I ate one of my mom's calcium pills. My mistake.

I don't like Jeff. Why I'm going to homecoming with someone I don't like, I don't have the slightest idea. The more he tries to hug me and cuddle with me, the further it makes me want to be from him. I just... don't like that stuff. 

I miss people. It seems like I'm always busy, but I'm never doing anything. I just miss it. I miss last year. That sucks. There's so many people I just want to hang out with. And be with.

I got my FALL OUT BOY TICKETS! Wooo! November 9th, here I come!

Fritz is slightly improving. Yes, there's still times where I want to kill him, but at least now there's times where I can tolerate him. I'm glad. I didn't want to have to kill a German boy.

<b>And I'm nothing more than a line in your book

My mom and my step dad have ganged (gung?) up on me, and it's bullshit. Honestly who the hell cares if the futon is left open or not. That's what it's meant for. That's why it's called a futon. Is so you can make it into a bed. Since I'm the only one ever fucking down there, why does it fucking matter?

The downsides to having a FES: The first two monthes, I'm stuck cleaning up after them, until my mom realizes that it isn't me who leaves watered down cereal in the basement. They leave cups in the computer room that stain the desk, and I get blamed for it. Their parents call at 7:30 in the fucking morning.

Last night my mom had me come home to clean up the kitchen cause I didn't put up my grilled cheese pan. So I did it, and then my mom pulled the "you aren't going anywhere until you clean your room" card. Dammit. She wouldn't let me leave after that either cause my bathroom wasn't spotless either. SHiiiit. She's lucky that watching the OC until 3 in the morning is kind of enjoyable.


I'm going to get my homecoming dress today. Wish me luck!

I hate saying goodbye. I've never been good at it. I'm not really sure if that's something I want to be good at either. I mean, who likes saying goodbye? Especially when you know it isn't one of those "see you later" goodbyes. It's a real goodBYE. Things, they are a-changin'. I just can't believe everyone is leaving for college so soon. Missouri? Sheesh. It's weird to think about that stuff.

I'm a ho.

My boyfriend (Brad Brody) is growing up to be so big. I'm so stoked!

On the other hand, I'm so glad things are completely in my control right now. Yes, I'm bad at being in control and such, but at least it's my decision. I'll probably fuck it up eventually, but it's good for now. Bitch.

Kayla- Sorry, I didn't have my phone with me alllll day, I was kidnapped. But we shall hang out for reals sometime very very soon.

Kian, Paul, and Chris- Sorry I didn't call you after cake! I was kidnapped.

<b>Same old story, not much to say <u>hearts are broken every day

How shitty. I can't believe I cried. I also can't believe that he turned out to be everything I expected him to be, that he swore he wasn't. OF FUCKING COURSE And that's exactly why it's hard for me to let myself fall for someone. Because they always turn around and say 'I don't care about you anymore'. Oh yeah, Fritz's BBQ thing is today. We're substituting Pizza for BBQ though. You're all invited, and sure as hell better be here. You will be called. On the way down, we understand what it means to break down.

Wow. It's amazing how 3 hours of sleep and the weight of a guilty concinous can effect your mood. And ability to spell. Plus, the thought of food revolts me. I didn't even drink last night. However, I finally sang "it's 4 o'clock in the fucking morning!" at the right time of day. And my new hero is Chris Pance, who can cuddle like nobody's business. Oh, and Jon= gross, but not as sick as Clint's room, I'll give him that. Write me off, give up on me, cause darling, what did you expect? I'm just off, a lost cause, a long shot, don't even take this bet.

Haha, fling. Meh. Oh well! Yesterday was kinda good but kinda bad at the same time. I went to play tetherball with Aleks and Thomas, thinking that we'd call a bunch of other people. It sucked bad for a while being the 3rd wheel. I got Andrew, Clint, Matt, and Kevin to come down. Andrew and Clint left after a while, then Aleks and Thomas left too, and I thought that was gay. I had to get a ride home from Kevin! And all my makeup, my iPod, and my keys are in Thomas' car, cause I figured he'd give me a ride home. Meh, Aleks will bring all my stuff later. Jeff.. Jeff..I'm pretty sure I got the point across though that I'm not interested. But because it was ME that texted HIM last night, Aleks thinks that I'm leading him on. Fuckin'... shit.. damn! I think its sad that I could easily go for one of his best friends. Or that I know that he'd go for me too, haha. "If you push me in Jeff, I'll kill you! And I'll take her!" I don't even know how I got into this situation, but nothing good can come of it. Buuuut, Jon is hot. And he has my towel. Kayla, oh Kayla, WHERE ART THOU?! Won't you think I'm pretty when I'm standing top the bright lit city?

I
<strike>want</strike> need
a
fling.

<b>That is all.

Holy smokes, I've had such an awesome time on vacation. Right now I'm just sitting in the hotel, waiting for tomorrow to come around so I can come home. I'm actually looking forward to it. I miss everyone so goddamndoucheass much. It's crazy. I think I have a date waiting for me too!... ;-) haha. To recap the whole trip: Saturday Drove. For about 6 hours to Pendleton, Oregon. I fell asleep for about an hour, but I was boooored. But we rented a Caddy, so it was pretty comfy! I even got to learn how to use GPS and all that fancy shmancy shiyit. Sunday Drove to Seattle. Gorgeous. I love that place so much. We had dinner with my one of my mom's old friends/coworkers, Darrel. That man was probably the nicest person I've ever met. He was just.. ugh.. I wanted to hug him! Not in like, that way. He was just so nice. He took us to the biggest grocery store thing ever. Sounds lame, but it was really cool. They had everything. Monday Pike Place Market. It really wasn't anything special, just a tourist attraction. But these guys, they're in movies and stuff, they throw these huge fish. HUGE. I got a picture, don't worry. It was kinda cool though. And I saw a guy on the street corner. He had bells on his shoes, a thing that attaches his harmonica around his neck, and he played the guitar while hoola hooping. Theeeen, he balanced another guitar on his face while doing all that. I gave him a dollar! Then we drove up to Anacordes Island. That place was the most amazing place I've ever been in. It was right by the Puget Sound, and just beautiful. Tuesday Explored the island a little bit. We went to the beach, but it was far too cold to get in the water. It was about 68 degrees. Perfect weather, I'd say! Around 4, we went WHALE WATCHING. By far the highlight of the trip. We went out on the Puget Sound, and saw two gray whales. My mom got all excited when they dove down and you saw their tales. It was cute. Then we went further out, and saw some orcas. There were about 8 of them, I think. They were really awesome. A couple swam right around our boat, and one went right under it! I tried to get pictures, but my camera died. It was so cool though. There's just something about seeing that kind of stuff that's so soothing and relaxing. Then we saw another gray whale on the way back, and he came right up close to us too! It was soooo cool. After whale watching, we went to eat at this grill place. A bunch of people from our whale watching group were there too. My mom had a few beers, and she was kinda drunk. There was this very attractive boy that I had been "making eyes" with all day. He sat at the table across the aisle. I started "making eyes" again, but turn around to find my mom waving at him. Gah. It was like.. full out embarrassing wave. Then she went to talk to the family. I made no more eyes. Wednesday Drove to Clarkston, Washington. Boring. 13 hours in the back of the car. I was very grumpy. We got to the hotel around 9, and I went straight to the hot tub. I met some really cool people there. 4 college kids were in the hot tub too. 19,19,20,21. The 21 year old was probably the funniest person I've ever met. There was also this kid there from Canada. He was 17, but not really my type. I did kind of a bad thing though, and told them I was 17. I talked to them for about an hour, and swam some. Then we went back to their room and chilled for a while. I learned how to play Super Mario aaaall over again.It was nice to talk to them though, since the only person under 40 I had really talked to was Dreama, Darrel's granddaughter, who used to live on an Indian Reservation. (Crazy). Plus, Logan was quite an attractive boy. And nice. He helped me learn how to play. "... face, book!" Thursday Drove to Boise, Idaho. It took 8 hours. It was only supposed to be 4. Ugh. Met some strapping young men in the hotel though. strapping. It's a really nice hotel too. Really sweet hot tub. SEATTLE WAS TITTIES!

Well I guess it's about time for a real update. Just cause.

<u>Quote of the day</u>
Andrew:Can I yell at these kids? *rolls down window*
Kaylee:Uhhhhh...
Andrew:YYEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEAH BITCHES!
Kayla:This is Governor's Ranch! You can't say those things!!

So anyways, I leave tomorrow, and I better hang out with all of you, bitches! Yeah, I'll only be gone for 6 days but man! I just.. I miss people! And I'll sure as hell miss civilization!

I had a really good talk with Andrew tonight. Awkward, but good. He told me that I always have to have my eye on somebody, and he's right. I hate that. Why is there a constant need for affection? Ugh. And he said that he understands that I'm lonely. Even though he was pretty drunk at this point, he made sense. "People pair off and you think 'I want that, I want to be in a relationship' and the next question that comes up is 'Who do I want that with?' And you have all this time to think about it because all you see is happy couples." I dunno. I liked it. Wise Andrew, wise... but from now on I'm just going with the flow. Because I feel lame talking about my feelings of lonliness online, because you're all dating anyways. I just hate the feeling of wondering what could have been, or what should have been.

I'm really tearing through my OC DVD's. Man, I freakin' love that show. Sevana and I were talkin about how our lives would make such a good Laguna Beach show. I named her hamster Justice, so everytime she feeds it she has to go "Justice is served" and do a sweet hand motion.

Oh, and I'm still quite mad about Juan. If I don't get an iPod back in time to go to Seattle, I'll fuckin'... shit I don't know. Fuck.. shit.. up!

Man, I wish ___________... But doesn't everybody?

Things can't be perfect all the time, that I know. Sometimes we just have to let some things go..

Free Condoms. Free Stickers. Free High Fives. Awesome bands. Bajillions of people. Sunburns, weird old men, 3 dollar water, and 100 degree weather. Always guarentees a good time. Always. Oooooohhh so today was awesome. Oh so awesome. Minus the sunburn. And the blisters. But they'll fade, and on the contrary, the memories will last. Haha. Corny. So there was Hawthorne Heights (I died.)The Starting Line (simply amazing). Fall Out Boy (pandemonium). Senses Fail (not as good live). Armor For Sleep. Hidden In Plain View. Gym Class Heros. Some UnderOATH. Emery. From First To Last. Holy smokes it was off the hook. Off it. Talked to Mickey and my tummy hurt. Oh yeah, and I punched a kid. (I killed a man with a trident!) Ooooh those MTV punks went down. I'll teach them to invade my personal space. To those who will read this, you missed out. And to Kayla, even though you're at camp, thank you for going with me. 3 years and I'm not even close to stopping. You can't beat it with a stick!

Where oh where is my summer love? Summers half over, and I'm getting lonely... 


I have a mosquito bite on the knuckle of my pinky. It's driving me absolutely insane.

No more caffine for me after... let's say 9. I'm so wired right now, it's ridiculous! Weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee

Uh duh.. Hypocrites really bother me. Don't even bother saying how much something annoys you if you plan on doing the exact same thing later that night. Or even if you don't plan on it. What a waste of my time. I really had a lot of fun tonight. I went to Thomas' house, and we tried playing frisbee in the park by his house, but then we remembered that we both suck at it. So after about 5 minutes, we decided that we should go get some KK instead. Went there, got a free donut, then went to King Soopers to get supplies to try... craw dad fishing. While we were there, we found the coolest shopping cart ever. It was a race car! So we pushed each other around in that for a while, and pissed some people off. Oooo, and in the parking lot, I saw Brittney and her boyfriend. I talked to them for a while, then some lady get into the car next to us, and she was about.. middle aged. At least. She started her car, started to pull out, and then turned on some gangsta rap really really loud. I started cracking up and was keeled over by the time she backed out. Hilarious. Then I saw Brian, and talked to him for a while. It's weird how everyone I know was at the King Soopers parking lot. Then we tried crawdad fishing, but to no avail. It was far too dark, I think that the fishies were sleeping! After that we sat in my car for about an hour listening to some country, then *//\\//sync, then Tarzan. Well, I know there's a reason to change.

"I wish people would just be honest. I'm not saying this because of any particular situation, I'm saying it because everyone does it. If you're going to sit there and talk bad about someone, how cool is it to hang out with them a half and an hour later? Seriously. Why can't everyone be honest. Yeah, sometimes honesty hurts, but at least the other person is getting the truth."

Yes, the livejournal sucks. No, I don't care right now. 


Branching out. Starting... tomorrow. It's not that I don't care about you. Honestly, I care about you a lot. Tons. 

Please put the doctor on the phone, cause I'm not making any sense.


(It's "I've Got A Dark Alley And A Bad Idea That Says You Should Shut Your Mouth(Summer Song) by Fall Out Boy, but it wouldn't fit.)

I lost my fucking keys tonight. I found them at 10:22. Thank gosh it takes 8 minutes to get home right? No. I get home at 10:31. As I pull in the driveway, I can see my mom's head looking at me from the window. Why would she be looking out the window at 11:30? Because she's a fucking bitch that's why. I come in and I can hear her whispering shit to my step dad. Then she comes downstairs and says, "you were going a little fast up that hill, weren't you?" "No, mom, I was going 25." "Oh well, you came in at 11:33, and it's now 11:35. You're grounded" "Mom, my clock says 11:31, I'm one minute late, sorry" "Look at the clock in the kitchen. It says 11:35 too. 2 out of 3, you're grounded".

What a damn bitch. She's mad because I've now opted to spend more time with my dad. I like it better over there because I don't have her breathing down my neck all fucking day. Except when she calls. Like she did 8 times the one day I spent there.

Hmm.. Fritz will be here in about a month. Part of me doesn't want him to come at all. I'm sure we'll have fun, and he'll be a nice boy, but damn, it hurts when they leave. I cried all fucking day when Adam left. 

Anyways, I'm lonely. I'm tired of screwing everything up. Anything good that happens to me.. I screw it up. I'm so fucking sick of it. I miss gettting butterflies when I see someone. I found myself determined to get someone back. But there's nothing I can do. I fucked it up. And now I'm just falling..  spiralling downward, hoping someone is at the bottom of this black hole to catch me.

"I'll sit and wonder of every love that could have been if I'd only thought of something charming to say"
and that was before they put on makeup!

Quote of the.. erm.. night?

Kaylee: Hey there, Mr. Grumpy Gills!

Chris: >:0 (that's supposed to be an angry face!)

Hahahaha.. well, I thought it was funny.

 

Oh, and I want these-

 

 

It feels like I've been punched in the stomach.. really hard. I wish I could just take back what I've said. And done. And felt.... No one else will understand.

Wooo got my carwashed! It's quite nice! Aaand now I'm going to Aleks' and we're goin' a-schwimmin'! It's gonna be a gooooood day. He's baaaaack! I wonder if that someone knows that they are the someone. My parents are gone tonight. They went camping. God, I could tell how hard it was for my mom to trust me enough to stay in my own house for the night. Haha. The second that I turned the shower off this morning "KAYLEE! can you come here? i need to talk to you!" "Well, no mom, just a sec" "Please hurry!" But it's kind of nice, being home alone. I can play my music as loud as I want and dance around and sing and just do whatever. It's nice. I've been waiting for answers, dancing in circles, making me sick I've been chained like a tiger to hunderds of liars all holding hands.

Oh boy. Long day yesterday. Got about 3 hours of sleep, but I still had energy! It was a pretty good day for the most part, except when my mom called me fat. Fucking shit. She told me I need to start eating better and going on fucking walks with her. Because I wear a fucking size five at Hollister. I mean sure, I've lost muscle these past couple monthes, but I've stayed at the exact weight for the past 7 monthes. Even more reason to worry about all that shit, I guess. Anyways, to cure the boredom: A- Age: Sweet 16! B- Band you are listening to right now: Saves the Day C-Crush: Plead the 5th D- Dad's name: Jack E- Easiest person to talk to: Kayla probably, but I can talk to a lot of people easily F- Favorite ice cream: Cake batter!.. Or that toffee stuff Paul had yesterday G- Gummy worms or gummy bears?: Worms are more fun H- Hometown: Littleton, Colorado I- Instruments: some gee-tar from time to time. and I play a mean recorder J- Junior high: Ken Caryl.. haha L- Longest car ride ever: Probably when we drove to Indiana last summer, but I slept through all of Iowa so it wasn't too bad. M- Mom's name: Debra N- Nicknames:.. Kay Jo? K-Money! Yeah! O- One wish: For a million more wishes? P- Phobia[s]: bugs, the dark, relationships..? Q- Quote from you: Oh.. I don't know. R- Reason to smile: Too many to name S- Song you sang last: You make me wanna LA LA T- Time you woke up today: my fucking mom woke me up at 12 U- Unknown fact about me: i.. um.. love you? - Vegetable[s] you hate: cauliflower (sp?) W- Worst habit: i over-analyze (haha, anal!).. and I'm immature X- X-rays you've had: my teeth for braces Y - Years since you've been to church?: I go sometimes Z- Zodiac sign: Airies that blew

I have discovered the only bad thing about driving when by yourself.



<big><big><big><strong><big><big><strong>P'Diddle.

Fuckin'... shit ass relationships.

I am such a silly silly girl, thinking that anything would work out.

I ran around the lake the other night, half hoping to see him there, and the other half just remembering walking around the lake with him.

When will I learn, for goodness sakes?! I'm so sick of screwing myself over. 


.. There's nothing I can do at this point, and that is why I'm so darn angry. Moving on is not an easy thing to do, especially when it's the last thing I want to do.

This. ... And you. It'd be nice if I could let you go without a second thought, and save myself the redundancy of an often broken heart, and maybe i'll see you a year from now, and we will talk about the weather, share an awkward smile, and a half listless embrace...

Weeeell, I'm in an incredible mood! Got hit on for real for the first time ever. Man, I never would have thought it would be that weird. But, the guy's name was Juan. If you don't know, that's the name of my iPod. It could never work out.

Then I came home and sat outside for about an hour. It was the first time in a while that I've actually just sat and looked at the stars/moon and just thought about things. I'm very very haaaaaaaappy! I picked out my favorite star. I really like it. It kind of twinkles.

BENJAMIN is moving the day after tomorrow. =( He still owed me a scooter date. I hate it when people leave. I liked being the only one he knew in this neighborhood. Today was pretty fun even though my mom = GAAAAY. I haven't done anything to the point of where she shouldn't trust me. And she shouldn't assume that I'm going to be JUST LIKE my step brother. Man, that kid was a trouble maker. But still. I'm quite offended. Quite. Yelling at 8th graders was fun. "It's past your bedtime, ho!". I just don't really like smartasses. I don't really know why... The best part of "Believe" is the "Lie" I hope you sing along and you steal a line I need to keep you like this in my mind So give in or just give up ... Random song lyric. I'm so bored right now. I'm going to write a novel. Well maybe not. I don't have anything to write about. Except that I'm in a better mood than I was before. I'm trying to remind myself that everything happens for a reason, whether I want it to or not. At this point (or at any point, really) I still can't change what other people feel. So.. the ball is in YOUR court from now on. It's just a matter of time until we're all found out

Today was quite a motherfucker of a day.
No doubt.

Started off excellent. Then I broke Kayla's garage and it was actually really funny. But then it all went to shit.

Got scammed. Silly us for thinking that everyone in this world has good intentions. Greed and Stupidity will be the downfall of this country. Gosh. That man was a bad, bad man. Being the good business woman that I am, though, I'm gonna get our moneys back! 
I was thinking about doing something else.. but that would make me just like everyone else in this dumb town.

I talked to Brad today. Man, I had such a crush on him last year. It was good to talk to him, I really enjoyed it. Also, I'm talking to Adam right now. What a crazy bad-ass hungarian. I miss him.
You know who else I miss? No, you don't, but I'm going to tell you! I miss Eric. And everything that we had last summer. Man, I blew that one. Big time. He's one of the few people I can still trust. He was amazing.

I had a dream about volleyball last night. I think part of me does still want to play it. Like at school. It's too late now. I'm just screwing everything up.


It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you <strong>knew<strong>.

I miss the person that you were, but I DON'T MISS YOU!
I also want someone who says "sweet dreams" or "sleep tight" when I go to bed. That's cute.

I have a bajillion things to say.
But I can't.
My words just aren't right.. 


Oh, gosh, I wish I could just say what I'm thinking right now.

"It's too bad and it's even sadder, losing everything that i thought,this was a lost cause, it was and i never knew it, i never knew it, try them on and let them go, it might be best to just forget me, walk away and know you're better off too, you're better off too.."

Gotta love summer flings/romances. Everyone's all paired up, and it's so flippin' cute. Man, I miss that feeling.

I just want someone to be there. I want a guy that I look forward to seeing, and who is dependable. Who will give me his shoulder when I'm sad, and will wipe away my tears. Who talks about sports and stuff more than he talks about my best friend. Someone who is hilarious, and will laugh at my jokes, even when they aren't funny. Someone who will go to the airport with me just to watch the planes take off. Who will watch girly movies with me and cuddle and hold my hand. Who's outgoing, and will try something new, for me. Someone who chases as hard as I do. Who will come pick me up. Someone who my mom approves of, but isn't boring. Who calls sometimes to see what I'm doing that night, and who checks to make sure my day is going well. Who will make fun of the gay things that I say, without being flat out mean. Who still comes over even though my dogs bark at him constantly. Who doesn't expect me to sit and wait for him, and understands that I like spending time with my friends too. Who will sing with me. Who I'm comfortable being in my sweats with. Who takes late walks around the lake with me. Who has "little surprises" and makes real plans for the night. Who can carry on a good conversation. Who doesn't make me feel dumb every chance they get, and from time to time, lets me be right.

Oh man, that shouldn't be TOO hard.

This year's love had better last.


It's times like these when I think of you and wonder if you ever think of me...
Oh gosh. SUMMER DRAMA. There's just nothing like it. I just can't believe there's so much of it, already. Ooooh, and, I LIKE PLAYING VIDEO GAMES! Keep it up, keep it up.
